des: "My boys love it when I make these for a quick snack!!!  My youngest calls them Pinka Butter Cookies."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x9 inch baking pan.
Mix crunchy peanut butter, creamy peanut butter, powdered sugar, egg and baking powder together. Press dough into a 9x9 inch baking pan.
Bake 8 to 10 minutes.
